mapper.sql: log_id as logId, login_time as loginTime, last_time as lastTime, log_week as logWeek, t_online_log.user_id as userId
mapper.select:
select
from t_online_log inner join t_user u on t_online_log.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_mac=#{mac} ORDER BY last_time desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_online_log(login_time, last_time, log_week, user_id) values (#{loginTime},#{lastTime},#{logWeek},#{userId})
